name: Sweet Potato and Coconut soup
instructions: Bake the sweet potato in the oven at 250c, for approximately 60mins, depending on the size* Remove the baked sweet potato from itsÂ´s peal into a pot, add the coconut and the spices. Blend and heat on the hob. Add water to get your desired soup consistency, I like the dish to be thick so I only added 1/2 dl of water.
instructions-extended: * If you wish to speed up the process, chop the sweet potato into quarters
